User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /create
Allow: /admin/cleanup

# Prevent indexing of shared schedules for privacy
Disallow: /share/
Disallow: /api/

# SEO optimizations
Crawl-delay: 1

# Sitemap location

# For production: Sitemap: https://quickavail.fyi/sitemap.xml  
# For development: Sitemap: http://localhost:3000/sitemap.xml
